data.text:
THE LAST DINOSAUR, 1977. Original 1 Sheet (27 x 41” / 69 x 104 cm) folded Movie Poster starring Richard Boone and co-starring Joan Van Ark, Steven Keats, Luther Rackley; Directed by Alexander Grasshoff. In this Japanese fantasy, science has announced the discovery of a lost land hidden inside a pocket of a dormant volcano under the polar ice cap. The world’s wealthiest man and big game hunter, Masten Thrust (Boone), along with his team, get trapped in this lost world and are in danger from both prehistoric humans and dinosaurs alike. “A Land Where Time was Forgotten!”

This folded poster is in good original C8 condition, but has some quality remarks: multiple pin holes in all four corners and in center of margins and minor wear along margin edges. Overall, this poster is in good shape and would look great Linen Backed. This service is an additional $80 upon request and would remedy above quality remarks nearly invisible once process is complete. For more information on linen backing please click here.

Condition C8. For Sale $150

*Shipping Charges*

“Buy This Poster” button adds a $10 base charge for shipping a folded or rolled poster or $15 base charge for a Linen Backed Poster within the USA. If outside the USA, please select the appropriate surcharge to your cart. We use Priority Mail International

If you do not see your location please <CONTACT US> and we will provide a shipping quote. We combine shipping.

USA

A folded or rolled poster is $10 or $15 if Linen Backed.

CANADA

For Canada, the shipping surcharge is an additional $35 or $40 if Linen Backed.

UK/EUROPE

For UK/Europe, the shipping surcharge is an additional $50 or $55 if Linen Backed.

ASIA/AUSTRALASIA

For Asia/Australasia, the shipping surcharge is an additional $55 or $60 if Linen Backed.
